DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label , Randomized , Comparative 3-Way Cross-Over Study Evaluate Effect Food 24-Hour Intragastric pH Day 5 After Twice Daily Oral Administration PN 200 ( Omeprazole/Naproxen ) Healthy Volunteers
